name: Beat Beauty
description: This game is a virtual reality music and dance game. Players choose the songs that need to be challenged at first. After the songs are selected, there will be beautiful girls dancing. There are 8 speakers at the back of the girl who will send music icons to the players. The players use the handle touches the icons to get the score. Player performance is scored after the song ends. There are currently 10 songs to choose from and will continue to be updated.
